name: PHVS_VISVaccines_IIS
title: VIS Vaccines (IIS)
description: This table lists the vaccines which require that a Vaccine Information Statement (VIS) be shared with a patient/parent. The VIS document type, edition date and presentation date are reported in a set of OBX.
